info.longBusinessSummary: Biken Techno Corporation provides general building maintenance services in Japan. The company offers cleaning and equipment management, security services, engineering, and hygiene management; leasing management, tenant management, construction management, total maintenance, and accounting; and cleaning and sterilization services. It also offers Renovation and renewal work, repair work, and renewal construction; building management, maintenance, and building optimization; reception/call center services; quality control team services; designated manager system; and PFI/market test services. In addition, the company operates various franchise businesses, such as Mister Donut fast food shop, Tsutaya video rental shop, Pronto caf√© and bar, and Salvatore Cuomo Italian restaurant. Further, it offers long-term care services that include visiting nursing, home help, and home care support services, as well as medical management consulting services; and manages nursing homes and nursery. Additionally, the company is involved in management of hotel; and Senior Life Business. Biken Techno Corporation was incorproated in 1963 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
